description.value:
You become trained in Society or Thievery; if you are already trained in both of these skills, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You can use Perception instead of Survival to [[/act track statistic=perception]]{Track}, and you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Experienced Tracker] skill feat.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.5RH1CkZQHYpsOium]{Edgewatch Detective}

publication.title: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace
